review.title: “SSC engineering is a very focused company. they strive to please and keep clients happy.”
review.pros: Pros – very flexible environment, family oriented. owners doors always open for discussion. variety of projects to work with. very diverse background of employees.
review.cons: Cons – very difficult to move ahead in the company. not very good at training employees to move up in company.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – be better at training employees
